_sText:
This is my new map, made by me.

Well, everyone must know the legendary game: Bomberman.
It's very simple and good game, so I had an idea to make this map, which is like the standard map in Bomberman, only in 3d.
------------------------
INCLUDES:
------------------------
-30 spawnpoints (15 each)
-buyzone
-Breakable blocks
-Unbreakable blocks
-secret

NOTICE! the little holes between the breakable and unbreakable block are ment to be, so you can see a little better.

Tip: listen sounds they are very useful in this map

If u have anything to say this map (good or bad) just post there ----------------->>>

You can modify my map as u wish, just make clear that i've done the original version.

I am not going to modify it anymore unless you find bad mistakes.

OH and almost forgot: PLEASE RATE THIS.

Edit: 
-light_enviroment added
